function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Customers sharing food-related experiences in person and online may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing information about food preparation and the people behind the business may lead to an increased risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and safety practices are not followed.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vicariously participating in everyday business and increasing perceived transparency may lead to complacency in following social distancing and health guidelines, risking the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enabling customers to interact with each other while respecting social distancing guidelines may lead to challenges in maintaining strict adherence to the guidelines, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in the food truck environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication of health and safety measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on social media for customer engagement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread in service ecosystems and local communities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drive around neighborhoods like the ice cream truck","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long lines of people waiting for food","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hashtags to be part of a larger conversation about the community","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaboration among businesses may lead to increased physical interaction and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community events and gatherings, such as food festivals and sports events, may lead to large gatherings and close contact, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to non-business community members may lead to a disparity in access to healthcare resources and support systems during a public health crisis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal collaborations between businesses could lead to increased risk of contagious disease transmission through close contact and shared spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers engaging in prosocial behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Fostering connections with other businesses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Customers frequently engaging in prosocial behaviors that involve the food trucks and their businesses.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in service ecosystems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers eating outside or in their cars","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dj playing music while serving food and drinks","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enabling improvised practices in the servicescape","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited dine-in options and restrictive social distancing rules","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers improvising to recreate the consumption experience outside their homes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited physical locations may lead to overcrowding and congestion in the area, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of specific days and times for food truck visits may lead to a concentration of customers at those times, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaboration with a local store may lead to shared facilities and increased interaction among customers, raising the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited food truck capacity leading to scarcity of popular food items","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regularized schedules leading to high demand and competition for meals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prosocial behavior resulting in potential spread of contagious diseases through food sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consistent food truck scheduling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent delivery times","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication about orders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close interactions between food truck owners and customers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of routines and establishment of new ones in response to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptation of servicescapes to accommodate changes during the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Food truck implementing new ordering system due to pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transparency in food preparation processes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transparent communication about changing regulations and pandemic impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Signalling heritage and cultural identity through food and branding","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Memorializing family members in food business promotion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact between service providers and customers through personal interactions and shared personal information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing personal and family information with customers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced hours and restricted services in the dining industry, including food trucks, may have increased congestion and close interactions among customers during peak hours, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Food trucks adapting service strategies during pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on social media for communication may lead to misinformation or incomplete information being shared with customers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited presence on social media platforms may result in decreased visibility and communication with customers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interpretation and theory building process may lead to biases or misinterpretations in the proposed framework of service ecosystemic value co-creation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of food trucks at local events increases the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited dining options at the local university due to construction may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
